official_title: A bill to modify the boundaries of the Sequoia National Forest, to establish the Scodies Wilderness, and for other purposes.
short_title: California Public Lands Conservation and Use Act of 1985

summary.text: California Public Lands Conservation and Use Act of 1985 - Title I: Bureau of Land Management and National Forest Service Exchange - Modifies the boundary of the Sequoia National Forest, California, to include specified lands. Designates Scodies Wilderness in the Sequoia National Forest as a component of the National Wilderness Preservation System. Title II: Dusey Trail - Requires the Secretary of the Interior to regulate the use of off-road vehicles on the Dusey Trail in the Sierra National Forest, California.

titles.title: California Public Lands Conservation and Use Act of 1985
A bill to modify the boundaries of the Sequoia National Forest, to establish the Scodies Wilderness, and for other purposes.
